name: Wombat's Dark-Gradient Trimps Style
description: Collates the in-built dark theme and some of the ideas suggested by Kid Sheldon's normal-coloured Gradient theme (on this site) into a dark-theme with gradient elements.
additional_info:
v1.1b: bugfix to not make all spire cells look non-corrupt/etc
v1.1: Added some amount of christmas event support! It will no longer blind quite as brightly as it did! Also did some adjustments, and some reorganising of the code, but mostly christmas support.
